validations.message:
Recommended property `description` is missing from `IndividualFacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"description": "An fast paced game that incorporates netball, handball and football."
```

Recommended property `image` is missing from `IndividualFacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"image": [
  {
    "thumbnail": "http://example.com/static/image/speedball_thumbnail.jpg",
    "@type": "ImageObject",
    "url": "http://example.com/static/image/speedball_large.jpg"
  }
]
```
Recommended property `hoursAvailable` is missing from `IndividualFacilityUse`.

Recommended property `description` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"description": "An fast paced game that incorporates netball, handball and football."
```

Recommended property `image` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"image": [
  {
    "thumbnail": "http://example.com/static/image/speedball_thumbnail.jpg",
    "@type": "ImageObject",
    "url": "http://example.com/static/image/speedball_large.jpg"
  }
]
```
Recommended property `hoursAvailable` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

Recommended property `offers` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"offers": {
  "@type": "Offer",
  "identifier": "OX-AD",
  "name": "Adult",
  "price": 7.5,
  "priceCurrency": "GBP",
  "url": "https://profile.everyoneactive.com/booking?Site=0140&Activities=1402CBP20150217&Culture=en-GB"
}
```

Recommended property `name` is missing from `Offer`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"name": "Speedball winger position"
```

Recommended property `ageRestriction` is missing from `Offer`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"ageRestriction": {
  "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
  "minValue": 15,
  "maxValue": 60
}
```

validations.message:
Recommended property `name` is missing from `Offer`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"name": "Speedball winger position"
```

Recommended property `ageRestriction` is missing from `Offer`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"ageRestriction": {
  "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
  "minValue": 15,
  "maxValue": 60
}
```

Recommended property `duration` is missing from `Slot`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"duration": "PT1H"
```

Recommended property `description` is missing from `IndividualFacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"description": "An fast paced game that incorporates netball, handball and football."
```

Recommended property `image` is missing from `IndividualFacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"image": [
  {
    "thumbnail": "http://example.com/static/image/speedball_thumbnail.jpg",
    "@type": "ImageObject",
    "url": "http://example.com/static/image/speedball_large.jpg"
  }
]
```
Recommended property `hoursAvailable` is missing from `IndividualFacilityUse`.

Recommended property `description` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"description": "An fast paced game that incorporates netball, handball and football."
```

Recommended property `image` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"image": [
  {
    "thumbnail": "http://example.com/static/image/speedball_thumbnail.jpg",
    "@type": "ImageObject",
    "url": "http://example.com/static/image/speedball_large.jpg"
  }
]
```
Recommended property `hoursAvailable` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

Recommended property `offers` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"offers": {
  "@type": "Offer",
  "identifier": "OX-AD",
  "name": "Adult",
  "price": 7.5,
  "priceCurrency": "GBP",
  "url": "https://profile.everyoneactive.com/booking?Site=0140&Activities=1402CBP20150217&Culture=en-GB"
}
```

Recommended property `email` is missing from `Organization`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"email": "info@example.com"
```

Recommended property `url` is missing from `Organization`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"url": "http://www.speedball-world.com"
```

Recommended property `logo` is missing from `Organization`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"logo": {
  "@type": "ImageObject",
  "url": "http://example.com/static/image/speedball_large.jpg"
}
```
Recommended property `vatID` is missing from `Organization`.

config.testName: UnnecessaryPaymentDetailsError must be returned when payment property (incomplete or otherwise) is included
config.testDescription: When prepayment is unavailable, include an incomplete `payment` object for B. Even though the `payment` object is incomplete, the Booking System should only respond to the fact that `payment` is included when it is unecessary, therefore returning an UnnecessaryPaymentDetailsError
